title: Manage Project Entitlements
description: A developer needs to secure the necessary permits and approvals (entitlements) from the city for a new retail development.

tasks.description: Prepare and submit the complete application package to the city planning department.
tasks.expected_outcome: The application is submitted correctly with all required documents.

tasks.description: Track the application's progress through the city's review process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides regular status updates to the development team.

tasks.description: Represent the project at public hearings and planning commission meetings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent effectively presents the project and addresses community concerns.
